title: Eclair. Episode 05
creator_credit: Alma Gray, David Ash, Pat McLagan and ILEA
brief_description: The series “Eclair” features Ted, a rather confused and naive Englishman and a pair of mischievous French adolescent twins. The theme of this film is: “Sport and recreation” and an introduction to the immediate future where the verb ‘after’ is used with the infinitive.
